name: In Your Dreams (Demo)
description:
What starts out as a normal day for single mum, Alycia, quickly turns into a nightmare as her son vanishes without a trace. Time is of the essence to find him but it seems like the world is going out of its way to stop her. Every night she dreams of her son and the animatronic fox who stood watch. But there may be more to these dreams than meets the eye.

This is a demo for upcoming game, In Your Dreams, and is an early access build, so a lot may change between now and full release.

Follow me on Twitter @arctosofficial for updates.
